t: Fourth Vision: High Priest and Branch
Then*p he showed me the high priest Joshua standing before the angel of the Lord,*s with Satan standing at his right side to accuse him.
The Lord*s said to Satan, “The Lord*s rebuke you, Satan! May the Lord*s who has chosen Jerusalem rebuke you! Isn’t this man a burning stick snatched from the fire?”
Now*p Joshua was dressed with filthy clothes as he stood before the angel.

So the angel of the Lord*s spoke to those standing before him, “Take off his filthy clothes!” Then he said to him, “See, I have removed your iniquity from you, and I will clothe you with festive robes.”
Then*p I said, “Let them put a clean turban on his head.” So a clean turban was placed on his head, and they clothed him in garments while the angel of the Lord*s was standing nearby.
Then*p the angel of the Lord*s charged Joshua,

“This is what the Lord*s of Armies says: If you walk in my ways and keep my mandates, you will both rule my house and take care of my courts; I will also grant you access among these who are standing here.
“Listen,*p High Priest Joshua, you and your colleagues sitting before you; indeed, these men are a sign that I am about to bring my servant, the Branch.

Notice the stone I have set before Joshua; on that one stone are seven eyes. I will engrave an inscription on it” - this is the declaration of the Lord*s of Armies - “and I will take away the iniquity of this land in a single day.
On that day, each of you will invite his neighbor to sit under his vine and fig tree.” This is the declaration of the Lord*s of Armies.
